channel.title: The 8 Bit Guy on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in The 8 Bit Guy on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Command Line
item.description: [whitebox] Hey all, Ernie here with a fresh piece from David Buck, who has moved away from his NES for a while to tell you all about how awesome DOS is as a creative medium. Yeah, DOS. [big]Today in Tedium: From the early 90s, up until 2005 or so, I did much of my computer gaming on an American Megatrends IBM PC, running MS-DOS and Windows 3.11. I even got online once using Netscape Communicator.
